line.comment: * OCV invades all sectors and put Xenon stations in them, leading to new Xenon invasions.
* in Zero Hour mod they slowly spread out from the OCV portal and don't focus on higher abnormal signal sectors
* Zero Hour: hard difficulty modifies OCV deep strike invasion chance and galaxy range
* no deep strikes if the OCV is grinding
* the random long range strikes cannot target the player if his empire is still small. Otherwise bad luck could make it impossible to prevent
* we don't want too many invader fleets in one sector (undefeatable doomstack) unless the OCV is grinding
* we have reached our invasion target. Now we check if any other invaders came here before us
* there is always a chance to stay, depending on how many capships are already here. But most of the time we do not want more than 1 OCV invader fleet per sector.
* Priorities: Huge ships, Big ships, Factories, Outposts.
* $target = find ship: sector=[SECTOR] class or type=[Huge Ship] race=null flags=$flags refobj=[THIS] maxdist=80000 maxnum=1 refpos=null
* $target = find ship: sector=[SECTOR] class or type=[Big Ship] race=null flags=$flags refobj=[THIS] maxdist=80000 maxnum=1 refpos=null
* Zero Hour: we need to ensure that Terraformer capships tend to spread out and don't create undefeatable doomstacks

sval.val: OCV invades all sectors and put Xenon stations in them, leading to new Xenon invasions.
in Zero Hour mod they slowly spread out from the OCV portal and don't focus on higher abnormal signal sectors
Zero Hour: hard difficulty modifies OCV deep strike invasion chance and galaxy range
no deep strikes if the OCV is grinding
the random long range strikes cannot target the player if his empire is still small. Otherwise bad luck could make it impossible to prevent
we don't want too many invader fleets in one sector (undefeatable doomstack) unless the OCV is grinding
we have reached our invasion target. Now we check if any other invaders came here before us
there is always a chance to stay, depending on how many capships are already here. But most of the time we do not want more than 1 OCV invader fleet per sector.
Priorities: Huge ships, Big ships, Factories, Outposts.
$target = find ship: sector=[SECTOR] class or type=[Huge Ship] race=null flags=$flags refobj=[THIS] maxdist=80000 maxnum=1 refpos=null
$target = find ship: sector=[SECTOR] class or type=[Big Ship] race=null flags=$flags refobj=[THIS] maxdist=80000 maxnum=1 refpos=null
Zero Hour: we need to ensure that Terraformer capships tend to spread out and don't create undefeatable doomstacks
